ThingDef.label: vinegar
ThingDef.description:
A sharp, acidic liquid created by fermenting produce, used for cooking, preserving food, and crafting artisan goods. It adds tangy flavor and extends the shelf life of various dishes.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 25 vinegar requires 50 ingredients with an 1.1 average value, for a total of 55, and sells for 6, giving a <color=#33CC33>63.33%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 10 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>20</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.24</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
